programme.title: La Vie Revee Des Autres
programme.desc: Franck and Karine abandon everything to settle in the mountains. On their arrival, their chalet isn't available. The property developers offer them an alternative, but it's far from being what they wanted. Little by little, bitterness and jealousy take hold, poisoning their relationship, until the irreparable happens.

programme.title: Le Specialiste
programme.desc: Hud, a notorious gunslinger, heads for Blackstone to avenge his brother Charlie, lynched by a mob who accused him of stealing from the bank. Convinced of Charlie's innocence, Hud investigates. But no one's talking and the loot is nowhere to be found.

programme.title: Nous Les Griots
programme.desc: Malik, Daouda's eldest son, wants to marry Mariama. But when a meeting between the two families, both originally from Senegal, is organised over a meal, Daouda discovers that they are from two very different social classes. His family is ''griot''; Mariama's is noble.

Totally unconvinced, she nevertheless passes the initial selection process.

programme.title: Il Etait Une Fois... Ces Droles D'objets - EP 54
programme.desc: Watches, speakers, toilets... Maestro takes a fascinating look at some of our most everyday objects, both old and new. How exactly to they work? What is their history?

programme.title: L'agence Galactique - EP 30
programme.desc: Specialist in every type of breakdown, Agence Galactique travels the galaxy to assist its customers. Aboard their spaceship Toaster, Dany Oven, Apple and Zed work wherever they're needed sorting out inhabitants' problems in their own inimitable way: happy, cheerful and totally eccentric.

programme.title: L'imagier Anime De Koumi - EP 29
programme.desc: At 6 years old the cheerful mischievous Koumi dreams of knowing all the animals in the world. Thanks to her picture book, she's able to head off and meet them.

programme.title: Taffy - EP 60
programme.desc: Wealthy Mrs. Muchmore lives in a manor with her beloved dog Bentley. One day, Scraggs the raccoon turns up disguised as a cat. Immediately adopted by the old lady, he becomes Taffy and laps up her attention. But Bentley is not fooled and decides to chase him off his territory.

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 51
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 52
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Nubu Et Yara - EP 31
programme.desc: Young Nubu is a little boy who's curious about everything but makes one blunder after another as he learns about life. Fortunately his wiser more responsible older sister, Yara, always has the time to explain things, offering the perfect opportunity for Nubu to dive into his own comic book world.

programme.title: 1001 Mondes Antiques - EP 5
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 8
programme.desc: Connonni is a little bird and maid of all work for Bamousso the chicken, who treats her very badly. One day, the king asks everyone to come and work for him. Bamousso sends Connonni in her place, and the little bird finds herself being rewarded for her services.

programme.title: Quasimodo - EP 25
programme.desc: Paris, 1483. 16-year-old Quasimodo is a hunchbacked orphan. One day, the gypsy Esmeralda, with whom he is in love, finds herself in trouble. He sacrifices himself to save her and ends up in prison. And so begins a long series of adventures...

programme.title: Pfffirates - EP 17
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: Les Petits Meurtres D'agatha Christie
programme.desc: Rose Bellecour gives a conference at her old boarding school. She finds herself accused of murdering a teacher, Julie Foment, also one of her old friends. Greco and Beretta have difficulty imagining the kind Rose as a murderer... They do everything possible to prove her innocence.

programme.title: Courants D'est - EP 21
programme.desc: Every other year, Meurthe-et-Moselle is home to the largest hot air balloon meeting in the world: the Mondial Air Ballon. Just next door we discover Les Ailes Anciennes de Lorraine, an association that renovates old planes. And to end, we discover a surprising cabinet of artistic curiosities in the Meuse.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie - EP 9
programme.desc: On the next stage of this French-speaking trip around the Czech Republic: a Franco-Czech literary love story in Petrkov, the history of the famous battle of Austerlitz near Brno, the second largest city in the country, and the story of a French-speaking Czech writer in Olomouc, the hidden ''pearl'' of Europe._x000D_

programme.title: Un Chateau Pour Les Fetes
programme.desc: Invitation to an exceptional Christmas Eve dinner at Champ-de-Bataille Castle in the Eure, a grandiose building from the 17th century. The guests have a daunting task: preparing a meal in keeping with the magnificent setting. To achieve this, they are supported by the Michelin-starred chef from Normandy, David Gallienne.

programme.title: Papilles - EP 3
programme.desc: In the Finistere, we meet the Breton chef Patrick Jeffroy and his disciples. This indomitable Gaul invites us to discover the unique people and ingredients that made him a Michelin-starred chef, all set against the spectacular background of the Brittany coast.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Vivement Dimanche
programme.desc: On his iconic red sofa, Michel Drucker welcomes and shines the spotlight on the talent of yesterday, today and tomorrow. A main guest talks about their career, their projects and their origins...

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 1
programme.desc: Spring, the perfect season for exploring Provence. As market stalls overflow with sun-drenched fruit and vegetables, cafe and restaurant terraces open, fields of flowers burst into bloom and forests and vines dress in their finest shades of green, Ismael Khelifa invites us to join him and discover this wonderful region...

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Top 14 Rugby Le Mag - EP 12
programme.desc: Presenting the day's action in the Top 14, the French rugby championship, with summaries and highlights from the matches, players interviews and comments.

programme.title: Partir Autrement Entre Amis - EP 8
programme.desc: Francis Reddy and Patricia Paquin, friends for decades, have dropped their bags in the county of Pajan, Ecuador. They discover the region's age-old art, typical dishes and traditional activities.

programme.title: Un Dimanche A La Campagne - EP 10
programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. In a house open to surprises and the unexpected, between emotion and laughter, each reveals the invisible thread of their personal story...

programme.title: La Grande Magie
programme.desc: The 1920s, an unhappy young woman staying with her jealous husband in a seaside hotel makes the most of a magic show to disappear. Demanding his wife's return, the husband is given a box he must only open if he has absolute faith in her. Charles begins to have doubts...

programme.title: Pachyderme
programme.desc: This year, as every year, Louise is left with her grandparents for a short holiday in the country. But this year turns out to be very different, it snows and a monster is about to die.

programme.title: Le Crime Lui Va Si Bien - EP 8
programme.desc: As Police Lieutenant Richer returns from leave, she finds the police station buzzing. Her partner, Captain Molina, has disappeared without trace. An internal investigation is launched: she is suspected of stealing evidence concerning a hold-up. Even worse, there is good reason to believe someone is out to kill her.

programme.title: Femmes De L'art - EP 2
programme.desc: She said: ''A woman artist must be capable of making primary sacrifices.'' With Berthe Morisot, the American artist is one of the few women to have taken up Impressionism.

programme.title: Franck Sorbier, Le Fil De L'ame
programme.desc: Having been absorbed by the world of haute couture in his youth, Franck Sorbier remained faithful to the exacting demands of creativity throughout his long career. An attitude that earned him the recognition of his peers and the unfailing support of those who still believe fashion is an art.

programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Bataille Pour La Foret - EP 6
programme.desc: We explore the concept of an ecosystemic approach to forest management. Now written into Quebec law, it improves the chances of maintaining the biodiversity of forest ecosystems but isn't always put into practice by the forestry industry as it should be.

programme.title: Sur La Route Des Vins Du Nord
programme.desc: Maximilien de Wazieres is a farmer in the Hauts-de-France region. Today, like others before him, he wants to become a winegrower. Crazy? No. In recent years global warming and changes to European regulations have dealt him a new hand: it is now possible to sell wine made in the Nord.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 49
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 26
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Toc Toc ! - EP 41
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: Les Mutants - EP 40
programme.desc: Learning that Zoubi is determined to divide up his land, Leo decides to block the sale with Dahlia's help. Meanwhile, Lila and Tom try to find out more about Mr Agrotek's unlocked mobile phone.

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 6
programme.desc: Chef Leila Albert prepares passion fruit and ginger ''creme brulee''.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Un Gars, Un Chef ! Speciale Fetes - EP 1
programme.desc: Programme summary: stuffed quail and ''puddings'' for Christmas; white pudding from Seraing; potato cakes; Eghezee potatoes; Madame Zizania; Laetitia's mocktail.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Jean-Michel Basquiat, Paris For Ever
programme.desc: TV5MONDE, the global French language network, offers the best television programmes from France, Belgium, Switzerland and Canada.

programme.title: Vue Sur Un Periple
programme.desc: John Tomasino and Ginny Duff are blind. Despite their disability, they share a real passion for sport, practicing cycling, swimming, skiing, running, sailing... Anne-Marie Rocher follows them as they head off by bike to explore the fabulous landscapes of Georgian Bay, Ontario.

programme.title: Le Specialiste
programme.desc: Hud, a notorious gunslinger, heads for Blackstone to avenge his brother Charlie, lynched by a mob who accused him of stealing from the bank. Convinced of Charlie's innocence, Hud investigates. But no one's talking and the loot is nowhere to be found.

programme.desc: A thug, with his partners, is chosen to work for a criminal gang, and he becomes the left-hand man of the leader. The leader declares a war against another criminal and the thug has to protect him despite losing his friends.

programme.desc: Shiva, a mechanic, goes to Delhi to deliver a letter to Thilothama that is from her sister. However, Shiva falls in love with her, but Thilothama, though she reciprocates, cannot express her feelings.

programme.title: ASO Sailing Programming 2024
programme.desc: The Vendée Globe is a single-handed, non-stop, non-assisted round-the-world sailing race that takes place every 4 years. The skippers set off from Les Sables-d'Olonne in Vendée and sail around 45,000 kilometres around the globe, rounding the three legendary capes (Good Hope, Leeuwin and finally Cape Horn) before returning to Les Sables d'Olonne. The race has acquired an international reputation, attracting skippers from all over the world.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Cheyanne Vlismas vs. Karolina Wojcik
programme.desc: This episode features a Fight of the Night contest between strawweights Cheyanne 'The Warrior Princess' Vlismas and Karolina 'The Polish Assassin' Wojcik, both making their debut. This was a 3-round war with one fighter taking home the split decision victory. Bonus coverage includes Rodrique Kena vs. Sifiso Ngcobo.

programme.title: WCCB Carlos Ocampo vs. Mikael Zewski
programme.desc: From the Colisee in Quebec, Canada, Mikael Zewski competes in front of his hometown fans against world-ranked veteran Carlos Ocampo of Mexico, with the WBC Continental Americas Super Welterweight Title on the line. Ocampo is a tough competitor, taking on the best in the world including Errol Spence Jr. for the IBF Welterweight World Championship. Zewski is also no stranger to the big stage, having held several North American and International WBA, IBF, and WBO titles himself.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this special one hour episode, we see the best of the World Judo Championships from Budapest where everyone in the world swarms to witness the crowning of 14 world champions. Also, world renowned fighter Teddy Riner experiences his hardest title defense in his career.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Juan Manuel Marquez vs. Marco Antonio Barrera
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a battle of multiple-weight world champions, as Juan Manuel Marquez challenges Marco Antonio Barrera for the WBC super featherweight title.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. Show 1 featuring Kakuryu, Ikioi, Endo and Yutakayama from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Matthew Macklin
programme.desc: This episode features an undisputed middleweight title fight between Sergio Martinez and Matthew Macklin, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode is highlighted by a heartfelt interview with the legendary MMA Hall of Famer Tito Ortiz that shows you sides of the former champ you never knew from his childhood to his love of fishing to the man he is today. We stop by "Cowboy" Donald Cerrone's ranch to see you don't need the flashiest training equipment to be a world class fighter. Plus Nate Marquardt gets his dream car and UFC ring girls bring us on a tour of a new gym.

programme.title: WCCB Jean Pascal vs. Michael Eifert
programme.desc: In this episode Jean Pascal (36-6-1, 20 KOs) and Michael Eifert (11-1, 4 KOs) battle it out in the main event from Place Bell in Laval, Canada. The contest pits Haitian-Canadian former world champion and a contender from Germany. The pair squares off in this 12 round IBF light heavyweight title eliminator.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about how the use of motion animation technology can help martial artists learn more efficient ways to put extra power behind their punches and kicks.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a heavily-anticipated contest featuring two of boxing's greats - Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Oscar De La Hoya. This fight set the record for most pay-per-view buys, as 2.4 million purchases led to over $135 million in revenue. The winner of this closely-contested bout would be WBC light middleweight champion.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: The next season opens with a qualifying round in Venice Beach, California. More than half of the obstacles used on this season were never seen before, and this premiere features exciting new challenges such as the Frame Slider, Domino Hill, Chain Swing and Flying Nun Chucks. Returning fan favorites in Venice Beach include parkour enthusiasts Kyle Cochran and Brent Steffensen.

programme.title: WCCB Artur Beterbiev vs. Tavoris Cloud
programme.desc: Coming off a tremendous amateur career where he captured Gold Medals in the World Championships and European Championships, Olympian Artur Beterbiev takes a big step up in competition in just his 6th pro fight, taking on former IBF Light Heavyweight World Champion Tavoris Cloud. Beterbiev had stormed through his first five opponents, scoring four knockouts, two of which took place in the first round.

programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBO welterweight title bout featuring then-undefeated Paul Williams and Antonio Margarito. It's a closely scored bout, but one fighter's push towards a strong finish may have put him ahead just enough.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 11
programme.desc: The Squirrels decide to start their own radio show.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 12
programme.desc: The Squirrels have fun learning what opposites are, with help from their animal friends!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 13
programme.desc: Tag's feeling grumpy because he didn't eat his breakfast, uh-oh!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 14
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn that friends can be like an extended family.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 15
programme.desc: The Squirrels are transported into the future where they encounter a robot Duggee!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 16
programme.desc: The Squirrels think about life's big questions, and gain their Philosophy badges.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 17
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels bake a pie and learn how to share by dividing things between them

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 18
programme.desc: The Squirrels get an interactive history lesson from Duggee and a host of famous faces.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 19
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn about different types of art and what inspires it.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 20
programme.desc: It's crazy golf time and the everyone has to make their own courses.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 21
programme.desc: The squirrels have to solve the mystery of the missing red ruby.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 22
programme.desc: It's time for the summer fair, and Eugene is the organiser.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 23
programme.desc: The Squirrels are exploring in the attic when they find an old cassette tape.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 24
programme.desc: Duggee is making a smoothie. The Squirrels can't agree on whether they like it or not!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 25
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels hop inside the Biology Bus and miniaturize themselves.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 26
programme.desc: Happy sets his sights on a questionable looking puddle that he is determined to splash in!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 1
programme.desc: Norrie skips into the Clubhouse and greets her friends. As they greet her, they reminisce about when they first met.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 2
programme.desc: Snail is thrilled to be moving house as she wishes to escape the wet and sploshy place she currently calls home to a more spacious house on the hill.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 3
programme.desc: As Roly makes his usual noise in the Clubhouse, Duggee and the Squirrels reminisce about how completely different Roly was when he first arrived.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 4
programme.desc: Duggee looks different, but what is it? By playing some looking games, the Squirrels learn how best to spot the difference.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 5
programme.desc: Happy has always loved the water. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 6
programme.desc: When the Squirrels can't figure out if fish have noses, Duggee shows them his library. But when the Squirrels realise no-one is visiting it, they have an idea...

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 7
programme.desc: The Squirrels are crafting in the Clubhouse when Betty saves Tag from throwing water across the table instead of glitter.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 8
programme.desc: King Tiger interrupts the Squirrels' quiet time when he turns up to the Clubhouse with a magic hat on instead of his crown.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 9
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having fun trying out games but are surprised to find out that Betty didn't always enjoy playing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 10
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet Duggee's old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldn't stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 11
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet a scruffelump in the woods, and despite Duggee's reservations, take him in. But they soon learn the responsibilities of taking care of a pet.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 12
programme.desc: The Squirrels lose Tag in the Clubhouse but to find him they're going to have to figure out where the Lost Property room is.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 13
programme.desc: The Squirrels need to rescue Enid when they see her at the top of the Mighty Sugar Bun Mountain.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 14
programme.desc: The Squirrels see Duggee accessorising his tie and want to learn how to do it themselves. All of the Squirrels accessorise an item and showcase their goods.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 15
programme.desc: Duggee masters his ambition of building a model of the Clubhouse out of sticks. This encourages the Squirrels to think of their own ambitions, and how they can achieve them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 16
programme.desc: The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 17
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 18
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 19
programme.desc: Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 20
programme.desc: As Peggee and the Hummingbirds journey up the river to deliver a parcel, they have fun spotting and avoiding the wildlife that they meet along the way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 21
programme.desc: After finding out that Mr Wobbly is visiting next Monday, the Squirrels impatiently want to know how long that means they need to wait.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 22
programme.desc: The Squirrels notice that Happy isn't acting like his normal self, and he's strangely wearing new trainers. Happy doesn't know what he's feeling, and his friends want to help him.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 23
programme.desc: The Squirrels become enchanted when they hear a piece of music from Duggee's choir. They quickly learn what makes a choir.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 24
programme.desc: The Squirrels hear a strange sound that they've not heard before, so they ask Duggee to help identify it.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 25
programme.desc: The Squirrels see Duggee reading about wise animals and wish to learn more about what it means to be wise.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 26
programme.desc: Norrie is running late to Squirrel Club, so Duggee teaches the squirrels what a commute is - a journey that can take you from home to learn, work or play.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 27
programme.desc: The Squirrels are confused when they see Duggee sitting on a ball because they all have their own favourite way of using it, whether it be kicking, throwing or catching.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 28
programme.desc: After learning that Duggee is making his yearly batch of blueberry jam, a tradition passed on from his great-aunt, the Squirrels decide to spread the news.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 29
programme.desc: As the Squirrels appreciate Norrie's new bike, they discover that she doesn't know how to ride it, she finds it too difficult.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 30
programme.desc: Before the Squirrels attend the cinema for the first time, Duggee teaches them that there are rules they need to follow.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 31
programme.desc: The Squirrels are getting ready for the same woodland adventure, but their mornings all look slightly different.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 32
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn about atoms, molecules and cells to help understand sizing when they try to sort a line-up of things from smallest to biggest.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 33
programme.desc: Whilst helping Duggee clean up, the Squirrels come across an old lamp. Duggee explains that many years ago, when rubbed, it could grant three magical wishes.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 34
programme.desc: Duggee has lost the list he made for the Squirrel's activities for the day at Squirrel Club. After a quick lesson on what a list is, they are happy to help Duggee recreate his.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 35
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having fun playing a song they made, but they wish that they could see themselves perform. Duggee has a great suggestion, and they learn how to be creative.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 36
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels set off on a warm-up run together. The Squirrels are feeling sleepy, but they are told that a bit of exercise will wake them up!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 37
programme.desc: The Squirrels are causing a bit too much mess in the clubhouse, so Duggee explains that they need to think more carefully about what they are doing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 38
programme.desc: The Squirrels can learn more about nature and wildlife if they follow five easy steps: watch carefully, stay at a distance, don't interfere, be patient and alert, and stay quiet.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 39
programme.desc: The hungry Squirrels turn to Duggee when they aren't sure what to eat. Fortunately, he has his cookbook The Clubhouse Kitchen: Tasty Bites for Hungry Squirrels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 40
programme.desc: When the Squirrels tell Duggee that they have nothing left to play with, he encourages them to use their imagination.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: It's raining, so Duggee and the squirrels stay indoors to do some drawing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Happy finds a cake lying around in the field and decides to eat it. But whose cake is it?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: Duggee is having a bad hair day. Can the squirrels help him at all?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: The Squirrels are out tobogganing with Duggee when they spot a bird fall from the sky.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: Enid the cat is stuck up the tree. How will Duggee and the squirrels get her down?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: The squirrels read a super-hero comic and decide they want to be super squirrels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: Duggee is making jam, but then his fruit is stolen.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: The Squirrels find a treasure map inside Duggee's big shiny ruby.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: The birds keep eating Duggee's grain, so the squirrels build a scarecrow.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: Duggee got a bouncy castle for Tag's birthday, who will get a chance to try it out?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: The Squirrels and Duggee go looking for a special leaf, but find something surprising!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: Duggee decides to make an omelette, but there's no eggs. Those chickens need to get busy!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: Duggee is sowing seeds. The squirrels want to grow something too but who will grow what?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 15
programme.desc: It's a scorcher of a day. Luckily Duggee has a paddling pool. Time for some fun.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 16
programme.desc: Duggee shows the squirrels how to make a paper boat out of newspaper.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 17
programme.desc: The squirrels hear an echoey voice coming from the top of a castle's spooky tower.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 18

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 19
programme.desc: Duggee introduces the squirrels to Bucky his old rocking horse. Saddle up, squirrels!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 20
programme.desc: Oh dear, poor Norrie is sick. Can the squirrels think of something to cheer her up?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 21
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet a little worm. It's swallowed a bit too much earth and has the hiccups.

programme.desc: The Squirrels build a maze out of all the things in Duggee's workshop.

programme.desc: It's a hot day and Duggee's flowers are looking sad. Some water would perk them up.

programme.desc: Duggee is blowing up balloons for Tino the grumpy artistic mouse's birthday.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 26
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels play hide and seek. Duggee counts while the Squirrels hide.

programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels decide to play Hide and Seek.

programme.desc: New stickers, with a picture of a mysterious bandit, have appeared in Toyland. Clockwork Mouse begs Noddy to investigate. Hoof thinks he's solved the case in no time, but Noddy's attention to detail makes him realise the bandit isn't quite what he seems.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 40
programme.desc: The pirates are having a spring clean of their galleon, much to the annoyance of Pirate Stripes who wants to go on a treasure hunt. Later that day, the pirate treasure disappears! Oh no! Noddy needs to investigate at once. A strange new galleon appears on the horizon. Could it be Tina the Terrible? Has she stolen the treasure? Using all his detecting skills Noddy follows the clues to the DareDale Caves where he realises that the ship on the horizon isn't Tina the Terrible's galleon at all.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 39
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Aardvark didn't have a sticky tongue. He had a long nose, big clumsy paws and he found it very difficult to eat. Then one day Aardvark's tongue got stuck in the honey log! All his friends pulled and pulled until KERPLING! Aardvark's tongue finally came unstuck. From that day on Aardvark's tongue was all long and sticky - perfect for eating yummy termites. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 40
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Whale didn't spout. Then one day there is a big storm in Tinga Tinga. The winds blew stronger and the ocean waves got bigger and bigger. Suddenly an enormous wave picks up Whale and carries her all the way from the ocean to the Waterhole. SPLOSH! But Whale was so full of water that she couldn't move! How do the animals help Whale get back to the ocean? For once, Elephant has the answer. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 39
programme.desc: Conrod is having an engine tune up at Silver Hatch. He boasts that his spoilers make him faster than all the other cars… who then want to be just as fast as their V8 hero…

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 40
programme.desc: Mr Carburettor is fed up with Roary and Maxi constantly bickering about who is the fastest car at Silver Hatch. He decrees that the pair will have a race, and whoever wins, is the fastest - no more arguing!

programme.title: Rescue Riders Huttsgalor Holiday S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: When a series of unpredictable winter storms threaten to ruin Odinyule, the Viking holiday of giving, the Rescue Riders must figure out how to save the holiday.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 68
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tina’s startup company for exploding baby Iggy’s favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corp’s current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.desc: Tip and Oh make their first inside joke and Oh shares it with everyone; Tip watches Oh's new alien plant while he's gone and breeds a catastrophe.

programme.desc: While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. S2 - EP 47
programme.desc: Skidmark gets jealous when White Shadow and Turbo become best friends; the crew must race as a bobsled team against the favored Jamaican Chickens.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender S2 - EP 47
programme.desc: Keith and Krolia cross a new space universe in search of a powerful source of Quintessence

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: During a food-themed show, Peabody realizes he is out of shape but still just can't stop eating so it’s up to Sherman to help him lose weight

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 67
programme.desc: The tots are playing at pirates, all except Primrose, who is being a princess, naturally. But guess which tot has the best pirating skills when they are needed

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 68
programme.desc: Primrose has broken her new necklace and lost the beads. She is unconsolable. Violet holds a make and do party to replace the necklace

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 41
programme.desc: Queen Sparklewings is having a fairy picnic in Fable Forest that evening. Everyone offers to help set up for the picnic but Queen Sparklewings tells them not to worry - the fairies can do it all. Later, when Noddy and all his friends are approaching Fable Forest Station on the train they discover someone has redirected the train tracks. They can't get to Fable Forest. How will they have the picnic in time? Noddy needs to investigate why the train tracks have been moved.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 42
programme.desc: Noddy returns from a Make and Take party at Pat-Pat's and finds the Builders are constructing a big orange palace in Toy Green. by order of the King of Toyland! Noddy decides to investigate: who is the mysterious King of Toyland? He spots the Knights carrying a royal litter, but all he can see inside is the top of an orange crown. Realising the King's favourite colour must be orange, Noddy remembers seeing Pat-Pat painting a bowl of oranges and wonders if she knows who the King is.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 41
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Parrot was the best keeper of secrets in the whole of Tinga Tinga. Infact Parrot couldn't open his beak at all! Then one day some beast dares to steal Lion's mane and Parrot sees the whole thing! But how is going to tell Lion?! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 42
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Bushbaby didn't have big eyes. She had tiny little eyes and she was always getting lost. Strange things begin to happen and there are stories that Majitu the Great Giant has returned to Tinga Tinga. Young Bushbaby doesn't believe a word of it... and convinces the other animals that Majitu the Giant does not exist. "If you can't see him, he's not real". But then she does see the Giant and her eyes grow big as planets. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 41
programme.desc: Roary is in a mischievous mood and keeps crashing into things. Big Chris has a great idea how Roary can burn up all his energy and be helpful at the same time!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 42
programme.desc: Farmer Green and FB are very nervous about going to Mama Mia's garden party. James and the other cars offer to teach them how to behave at such an event. But everything doesn't quite go to plan…

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Cutter gets a chance to be a "mom" when a newly hatched dragon bonds with him, and they'll both be needed to get the others out of a tangled mess.

programme.title: Go Dog Go! S2 - EP 28
programme.desc: Tag's scooter breaks down during a Race Cadet challenge to deliver boxes of Sam Whippet’s Chocolate Chippet’s the fastest. So Tag and Scooch must rely on other ways of getting around town. / Muttfield the Magnificent is set to perform a magic show at Yip’s birthday party! Until he accidentally makes himself disappear. Muttfield instructs Tag and Scooch to retrieve three magical items to make him appear again. But can they do it in time?

programme.title: Monster Beach

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 - EP 13

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places. Watch as some of Canada's finest police officers are pushed to the limit in a gruelling 17 week training programme at the PCMP's Police Dog Service Training Centre in Canada.

programme.title: Johnny Kingdom's Wild Countryside
programme.desc: In this series Johnny Kingdom takes us through the enormously varied landscape and wildlife of Exmoor, one of the UK's most glorious national parks.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and "accepted wisdom" to find the real story. programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. programme.title: Drama Serial "Carnation" Encore Eps. 78
programme.desc: A heroine born into a kimono store family in Kishiwada, Osaka, holds admiration for clothing and discovers a sewing machine. Despite her father's opposition, she is undeterred and pursues her passion for dressmaking. She opens a store at age 20 and gets married, but her husband dies in the war. The story depicts the life of a powerful woman who becomes a pioneer of Japan's fashion design while overcoming many obstacles.

programme.title: Project X: The Challengers-New Beginnings
programme.desc: Project X returns for the first time in 18 years. The former series featured people involved in project related to the Japanese industry and contemporary history. The new series focuses on people in the "Lost Era" following the collapse of the bubble economy. In every era, there are always those take on challenges. Even without receiving praise or being in the spotlight, some dedicate themselves to their work. The documentary delivers passion and courage right to you.

programme.title: Premium Drama "Kiriko's Crime Diary" Eps. 5 (Final)
programme.desc: Hitotsubashi Kiriko (Matsuzaka Keiko) is in deep sorrow. While it was hard enough to making her life living on her pension and part-time income, she is struck with a sense of emptiness and despair after the death of her best friend from an illness. One day, Kiriko is inspired by the words of an arrestee she saw on TV, who said, "I have no regrets in my life, and I committed the crime only to go to prison," and she sets her final home as "prison".

programme.title: What the Villains Have to Say

programme.title: Drama Serial "Carnation" Encore Eps. 79
programme.desc: A heroine born into a kimono store family in Kishiwada, Osaka, holds admiration for clothing and discovers a sewing machine. Despite her father's opposition, she is undeterred and pursues her passion for dressmaking. She opens a store at age 20 and gets married, but her husband dies in the war. The story depicts the life of a powerful woman who becomes a pioneer of Japan's fashion design while overcoming many obstacles.

programme.title: Project X: The Challengers-New Beginnings
programme.desc: Project X returns for the first time in 18 years. The former series featured people involved in project related to the Japanese industry and contemporary history. The new series focuses on people in the "Lost Era" following the collapse of the bubble economy. In every era, there are always those take on challenges. Even without receiving praise or being in the spotlight, some dedicate themselves to their work. The documentary delivers passion and courage right to you.

programme.title: ETV Special "Silence Under the Law
programme.desc: The Supreme Court ruled in July that the Eugenic Protection Law is unconstitutional. Thirty-nine of approximately 25,000 victims have sued the government. Many of them still carry the wounds in their hearts. Why has society overlooked forced sterilization for half a century? The documentary explores the reasons behind the silence caused by the Eugenic Protection Law from both the victims' and society's perspectives.

programme.title: Drama Serial "Come Come Everybody" Encore Eps. 26
programme.desc: In 1925, radio broadcasting was initiated in Japan and soon after, a program for English language learners began. This is a family drama depicting 100 years of three generations who lived with this English radio program; Yasuko who was born on the same day as the radio broadcasting started, her child Rui, and grandchild Hinata. Listening to the radio, these three heroines find their own ways of living overcoming hardships.

programme.desc: Liu, a swordwoman in Song Dynasty, marries the poet Chen after being captivated by his avant-garde poetry. Soon, Chen discovers that his new bride is violently temperamental and insanely jealous, restricting his lifestyle. When the Emperor decrees that Chen must take a princess as a second wife, their love is put to the test.

programme.title: James' Going Places 8 - EP 21

programme.title: Death By Zero - EP 3
programme.desc: Yim Mo, once known as the prestigious "Yama," ruined his family due to a blunder, leading him to become a mediocre killer. His downfall led to the rise of the legendary assassin, Kiu Sing, aka Zero. Their destinies are soon rewritten when an "Assassin Hunter" appears, forcing them into a life-or-death confrontation.

programme.title: Young Lady and Gentlemen - EP 50

programme.desc: Shen Miao is the treasured daughter of the wealthiest merchant in Yangzhou City but is not the luckiest when it comes to marriage. Stay tuned to a twisted love tale she's involved between a talented scholar and rich glib.

programme.title: Golden City - EP 520
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1847
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Hilarious Family - EP 16
programme.desc: This heartwarming drama tells the story of Du Ruyu (Liu Lin), a single mother who has been widowed for 18 years, raising her four daughters, each with very different personalities, on her own. The family is filled with both laughter and tears.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes VI: Redemption - EP 24
programme.desc: Confronted with a series of complex mystery cases, Forensic Scientist Yu Xingbo (Bosco Wong), Inspector Jing Haoran (Benjamin Yuen), and Forensic Doctor Fan Peiqing (Jacky Cai) use science to unravel the mysteries step by step and uncover the truth.

programme.title: Are You The One - EP 30
programme.desc: The story centers Liu Mian Tang (Wang Chu Ran), who is severely injured and rescued by Cui Xing Zhou (Zhang Wan Yi). Mian Tang mistakes Xing Zhou for her husband after waking up with amnesia. She follows him to guard the frontier, and eventually fall in love.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1848
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Treasure Of Destiny - EP 1
programme.desc: The series tells the story of some strange people with different identities and backgrounds, using their own expertise and abilities to start a fantasy adventure for the long lost 'Treasure of Destiny'.

programme.title: Treasure Of Destiny - EP 2
programme.desc: The series tells the story of some strange people with different identities and backgrounds, using their own expertise and abilities to start a fantasy adventure for the long lost 'Treasure of Destiny'.

programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.17) - EP 75
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: Sky is the Limit, The - EP 18
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mother’s pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 23
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 24
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONG’s simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNG’s dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chung’s International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 31
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 34
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: Word Twisters' Adventures - EP 16
programme.desc: The most difficult thing for an articulate legal expert is not to win a lawsuit but to bargain for a twist of fate. Plagued by a mysterious family curse, CHAN MUNG-KAT (Chan Siu Chun), who comes from a legal family, is forced to fool around and devotes all his time to running a brothel despite his great talent.

programme.title: As Sure as Fate - EP 16
programme.desc: Due to business failure, De (Yuan Siu-hsiang) and his wife Mei (Kwok Siu-yun) returned to Hong Kong from Canada to seek further development due to business failure. rapport. However, De's father (Guo Feng) felt that the space at home was cramped, so he decided to sell his old residence and loaned the deposit received at high interest to his daughter Fei (Teng Liming)'s boyfriend Jian (Xie Tianhua).

programme.title: Ringmaster, The - EP 16
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-hei’s boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.title: Seventh Day, The - EP 2
programme.desc: The tale begins on the seventh of August, when WING and YAN first encounter their own dream girl on the island. WING works as a lifeguard on the outlying island. He gets to know pet shop assistant LING KA-YAN (CHOW LAI KI, NIKI) by chance and is soon mesmerized by her endearing personality. YAN who works at a coffee shop meets a romance comic artist called WONG CHI-KWAN (TONG SZE WING, NATALIE). Being misled into believing that the girl is from a rich family, YAN decides to chase her.

programme.title: Highs and Lows - EP 5
programme.desc: As a Senior Inspector of the Narcotics Bureau Operation Unit, HEUNG WING (Miu Kiu Wai) profoundly abhors evil. He and WAI SAI-LOK (Raymond Lam) - Senior Inspector of the Intelligence Unit have closely co-operated with each other as peer mentors, frequently solving drug trafficking cases for the Police Force. During an operation to knock down the targets, SAI-LOK discovers clues that HEUNG WING is most likely the corrupt cop in a collusion conspiracy with drug dealers.

programme.title: Highs and Lows - EP 6
programme.desc: As a Senior Inspector of the Narcotics Bureau Operation Unit, HEUNG WING (Miu Kiu Wai) profoundly abhors evil. He and WAI SAI-LOK (Raymond Lam) - Senior Inspector of the Intelligence Unit have closely co-operated with each other as peer mentors, frequently solving drug trafficking cases for the Police Force. During an operation to knock down the targets, SAI-LOK discovers clues that HEUNG WING is most likely the corrupt cop in a collusion conspiracy with drug dealers.

programme.title: Dry Wood Fierce Fire
programme.desc: Alice works for a women's magazine and falls for Ryan, who is hired to run the men's magazine, both owned by magazine tycoon Michelle. Ryan only has eyes for Michelle and Alice tries to hide her true feelings to help him win Michelle.

programme.title: How to Choose a Royal Bride
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager has arranged young and eligible women for Emperor Kangxi's selection. Kangxi is uninterested and becomes bored with the process. He decides to travel incognito as a businessman around the country when he meets Nalan Qiong Yao, who disguises herself as a man to avoid a possible arranged marriage with the Emperor...

programme.title: Frugal Game
programme.desc: How do you overcome unemployment, divorce and crippling debt? Diana and Wai start a fake family to join a frugal game show on TV. To stimulate ratings, the producer forces the director, Tsui, to twist the game from an encouraging environment to a torturing one. As the fake family gets close to the prize, Tsui comes up with some bad ideas...

programme.title: Challenge of the Gamesters
programme.desc: A gambling master and his partner are hired by the government to investigate another gambler who may be working as a Japanese spy in Shanghai.

programme.title: Casino Tycoon
programme.desc: Inspired by the story of Macau's Casino King Stanley Ho, the movie traces his blood-splattered fight to the top from 1930s to 1960s. In 1941, a young graduate, Benny Ho, flees Hong Kong during the Japanese invasion and heads for Macau. Benny starts as a labourer but rises to the top of the city's casino business with his courage, wisdom and diligence.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quin's trust, Nick becomes his protege and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Whatever You Want
programme.desc: An illegitimate daughter of a businessman gets three wishes from a genie, Bo. However, Bo's magical power is far from perfect, leading to much hilarity in this charming fantasy comedy.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong's toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: How to Pick Girls Up !
programme.desc: Xin, a helpless loser in love, calls in to a radio show hosted by DJ Tsang to ask desperately for help. A self-proclaimed love expert, Tsang takes it upon himself to make sure Xin meets girls and leads him on a series of absurd excursions into the wild and dangerous world of modern love.

programme.title: Armour of God
programme.desc: Jackie, the Asian Hawk, steals treasures from remote places and resells them at a good price. He finds the mysterious and legendary "Armour of God" and sells it to the Earl. When terrorists kidnap his ex-girlfriend Laura in exchange for the "Armour of God", Jackie borrows it from the Earl for a final showdown with the terrorists to save her.

programme.title: Crazy N' The City
programme.desc: An apathetic Hong Kong police officer, Chris, is weary of his 7-year patrol unit work life. Tension arises when an energetic and conscientious policewoman, Nam, becomes his partner. However, as time goes by, Nam's dedication and bravery in her line of duty begins to reignite Chris' passion for work and life.

programme.title: Hong Kong Playboys
programme.desc: Sheng is a rich playboy who lives a carefree and fun life with the ladies, until his mother decides that he should get married. Up against other lady killers in his quest to find Miss Right, Sheng must decide what he wants.

programme.title: Justice, My Foot!
programme.desc: Chow stars as Sung, a lawyer who uses any means necessary to help his wealthy clients escape the law. Sung retires to the countryside when urged by his wife, but when Mrs Sung encounters a woman whose husband's death has been covered up by corrupted officials, Sung returns to the court for justice to be served.

programme.title: Everlasting Love
programme.desc: Young intern doctor Eric meets Pei Jun and quickly falls in love with her, unaware that she works as a hostess in a night club. Despite their social differences, can their love story defy the odds and lead to a happily ever after?

programme.title: Doubles Cause Troubles
programme.desc: Two squabbling cousins find themselves in more trouble than they can imagine after their tenant ends up dead. The gangsters and the police are both after them, and they have no idea what they have done wrong!

programme.title: Winner Takes All
programme.desc: Swindler Master Wong has cheated Pauline's father of his lifetime savings and Pauline vows to bring him to justice. On the way to find Wong, Pauline befriends a young conman and teams up with him to set up a perfect plot to scam Wong. Will their plan succeed and can she uphold justice in the end?

programme.title: Miss Du Shi Niang
programme.desc: A famous prostitute Du Shi Niang has always hoped to find her true love in the brothel. Eventually, she meets a handsome student Li Jia and they fall in love at first sight. However, Du Shi Niang is suspicious of him and uses all means to test his love, not knowing that some people are just unable to stand up to the test...

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddy's lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: Flash Point
programme.desc: Sergeant Ma Jun is a hot-headed cop who vows to take down three powerful triad drug dealing brothers. His fellow officer, Wilson, is an experienced undercover agent working within the triad gang. They both agree to a partnership, but when Wilson's cover is blown, Jun is forced to confront the gang with the only way he knows - his fists.

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Chen Li Pin, the nerdy son of a business tycoon, and his friend seek love in Hawaii. Returning home in disappointment, they accidentally find themselves in a messy identity swap. It is at this time that Chen falls for a beautiful girl May, who thinks he is a company chauffeur...

programme.title: Mahjong Heroes
programme.desc: A hero helps a young student deflect a cunning and malicious gambling tycoon who is out to take over the student's family business over a game of mahjong.

programme.title: The Flying Mr. B
programme.desc: Mr. Shi, a secondary PE teacher, accidentally takes a "super pill" invented by the science teacher and gains superpower, turning into Mr. B. He uses his superpower to help the school sports team win the championship and prevent crimes. When the triad is made aware of Mr. B's superpower, they try to gain the super pill for nefarious purposes.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays an arrogant god in Heaven who is being punished for his pranks and mistakes. He is sent to Earth and reincarnate as Mad Monk to change the destiny of three misguided souls - a prostitute, a beggar and a villain. The Mad Monk needs to complete the task in three days in order to return to Heaven.

programme.title: Mr. Possessed
programme.desc: Riley is cursed by an evil spirit to not be able to approach any woman. When he falls in love with Siu Yu, Riley's mother decides to use her to help him vanquish the evil spirit. On their wedding night, Riley passes out after protecting Siu Yu from the attack of the evil spirit. Can the two finally break the curse?

programme.title: One Nite in Mongkok
programme.desc: A mainland hitman Loy is hired to avenge the death of a gangster's son but the police are onto him from the start. While hiding in the dense streets of Mongkok, Loy saves a call girl Dan Dan from some gangsters. Loy and Dan Dan are hunted around Mongkok by police and gangsters. Who wiIl find them first, the lawful force or the lawless one?

programme.title: The Story Of My Son
programme.desc: Li attempts to make a fortune at the horse-racing tracks, but is subsequently entangled with loan sharks. Li becomes debt-laden while his sons are harassed by debt collectors, when more heart-wrenching events begin to unfold.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: City of Desire
programme.desc: Sister 13 returns to Macau after 17 years to succeed her father's underground empire, the prostitution business. She tries to stop their exploitation of the sex workers, but Macau's economy flourished after the handover, propelling the prostitution and gambling businesses. The city is blinded by desire and Sister 13 can do nothing to help...

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters' best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: The Gambling Ghost
programme.desc: Sammo Hung plays three roles: Fatty, Fatty's father and grandfather. Hoping to become rich, hotel staff Fatty dives into gambling with his friend to the dismay of his father. When Fatty hits rock bottom, his grandfather's ghost appears to help him. As Fatty finds out that his grandfather was murdered, he vows to avenge his death.

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Notorious assassin Nieh Cheng has retired into hiding. However, when Premier Yen's family is massacred, he seeks out the reclusive swordsman and coaxes him into a final revenge mission in this epic story set in the Six Kingdom era.

programme.title: Black Magic
programme.desc: Hsu Lo is up against an evil black magic practitioner San Kan Mi, who wants to place a death spell on him and a love spell on his fiancee Wang Chu Ying. Fortunately, Wang's friends manage to find another veteran witch doctor to take on the evil San. This bone-chilling tale of good versus evil races to a heart-stopping ending.

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: The Adventures of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people's livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: The Sword Stained with Royal Blood
programme.desc: Adapted from Jin Yong's novel, the movie depicts the havoc breaking out in the martial arts world when a warrior on the run uncovers a sword, a training manual, a treasure map and a secret message on the body of a deceased martial arts master.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: Call to Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: Demon of the Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: The Pearl Phoenix
programme.desc: In Huangmei Opera tradition, this movie tells the love story of Wen, who sells himself as a slave to a rich family, and Huo, the family's young daughter. The lovers are kept apart by Huo's stepmother and Huo escapes by dressing up as a man. Wen is framed and put into jail so Huo has to go back and rescue her lover!

programme.title: Killers On Wheels
programme.desc: Kuo takes his family to an outlying island of Hong Kong for a vacation. On the ferry, they meet a group of young hooligans cum motorcyclists called the "speed gang", led by Johnny, and Kuo's sister Carrie is molested by Johnny's brother Michael. Kuo's family continues to be harassed by the "speed gang" while on the island - can Kuo protect them?

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bat's knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit...

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fete. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant's confusion, threatening the couple's union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Duel Of Fist
programme.desc: Fan Ke discovers at his father's deathbed that he has a half-brother, Wenlie, in Thailand. He goes to find Wenlie, who became a boxer to support his sick mother. Following their encounter, the two got involved in the underworld of boxing match gambling.

programme.title: Asia-pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chan's family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chan's daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The General's henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: Purple Darts
programme.desc: A girl vows to take revenge for her parents who were murdered by four outlaws when she was only a baby. To do so, she trains hard at martial arts and teams up with a swordsman and a couple to finally kill them all.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor's sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Peng Nan are a devoted couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he finds out that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Mui's embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love...

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandit's camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leader's wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: Cat VS Rat
programme.desc: Zhan and Bai are equally matched in martial arts skills. Bai saves the Emperor one day but did not believe in his identity and rejects a promotion. When Zhan is promoted to the royal guard after saving the Emperor, Bai gets angry and tries to prank him by stealing the imperial jade seal. Luckily, Zhan is able to retrieve the seal with his skills.

programme.title: The Black Butterfly
programme.desc: Kwan leads a double life as a waitress and as an infamous outlaw skilled in martial arts, The Black Butterfly. When she steals a cache of gold from the Five Devils Rock bandits, she soon has the bandits, and the government, on her tail.

programme.title: Perfect Match 12 - EP 7
programme.desc: Perfect Match is a highly-rated large-scale dating variety show that connects eligible bachelors to bachelorettes in China. Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Axian Small Town Foodcation - EP 5
programme.desc: Unearthing flavours along the small town trail, Axian Small Town Foodcation is seeking out a trail for nostalgic foodies to follow. Along the way, food is not the only nourishment, the stories and memories that unfold along the way feed the soul as well.

programme.title: In The Storm - EP 24
programme.desc: The anti-corruption action series zooms in on the Hong Kong ICAC and Serious Crimes Unit overcoming the unexpected challenges and eventually cracking down on corruption syndicates.

programme.title: In The Storm - EP 25
programme.desc: The anti-corruption action series zooms in on the Hong Kong ICAC and Serious Crimes Unit overcoming the unexpected challenges and eventually cracking down on corruption syndicates.

programme.title: James' Going Places 8 - EP 21
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies in Taiwan!

programme.title: Chinese Restaurant 8 - EP 12
programme.desc: This season, the show ventures to Fondation Monet in Giverny, France, with inventive Olympic and Chinese fashion-themed dishes. Unearth new food stories in France's beautiful villages.

programme.title: Genius Go Go Go - EP 207
programme.desc: This large-scale variety show gathers showbiz entertainers to challenge each other in various hilarious educational games. Viewers at home are also encouraged to get in on the fun and try out the games with friends in real life!

programme.title: Mr Player 15 - EP 21
programme.desc: Get ready for some serious fun with one of Taiwan's most popular outdoor variety shows! Golden Bell Award-winning hosts Jacky Wu and KID travel all over Taiwan and other parts of the world alongside celebrity guests to compete in races and complete missions.

programme.title: Taxi Driver 2 - EP 2
programme.desc: The sequel continue to focus on the underground taxi company 'Rainbow Transfers' that offers a special 'revenge-call' services to its clients who have been wronged and helps them take revenge. Follow Do Ki's vengeful journey.

programme.title: Kazama Kimichika: Kyojo Zero - EP 11
programme.desc: Kazama Kimichika (Takuya Kimura) works as a detective instructor. Through a system called 'Kazama Dojo,' a rookie detective is paired with Kazama, and they investigate an actual murder case together. The rookie detective learns techniques used by Kazama while they work on the murder case.

Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Time Concert 2024 - EP 4
programme.desc: After 20 years, the Girls are back on stage! "Time Concert 2024" revives nostalgic melodies, celebrating two decades of music with a dazzling showcase and a competition for the top hits of the era!

programme.title: The Spicy Flavor of Shaanxi - EP 4
programme.desc: Each specialty dish from Shaanxi exudes a deep, smoky aroma, revealing its rich culinary tradition. Step beyond the boundaries of space and time to embark on a tantalizing journey of aroma and spice, and savor the unique flavors exclusive to Shaanxi.

programme.title: In The Storm - EP 26
programme.desc: The anti-corruption action series zooms in on the Hong Kong ICAC and Serious Crimes Unit overcoming the unexpected challenges and eventually cracking down on corruption syndicates.

programme.desc: Liu, a swordwoman in Song Dynasty, marries the poet Chen after being captivated by his avant-garde poetry. Soon, Chen discovers that his new bride is violently temperamental and insanely jealous, restricting his lifestyle. When the Emperor decrees that Chen must take a princess as a second wife, their love is put to the test.
